title: Nu veviwo & Ŋkɔwo - Orbital Gbedoxɔ
heading: Nu veviwo & Nusiwo Woyɔ
description: Nutata sia si wowɔ ƒe geɖe la nye Mercosul Bienal 13 lia si wowɔ le Porto Alegre, Brazil, si dzi Marcelo Dantas kpɔ la ƒe akpa aɖe. Woŋlɔe ɣeyiɣi didi aɖe be woaxɔ Lumen Prize 2022 - Futures Award. Eɖu dzi le CubeDesign 2021 hoʋiʋli ƒe ArtSat Ƒomedodo hã me, si Brazil Yamenutome Numekuku Dɔwɔƒe (INPE) do ɖe ŋgɔ.

imageAlts.mercosul: Mercosur Ƒe Eve Ƒe Ƒe Ðeka
